data.title: News & Events - Wheatland Conservation
data.meta_description: In the meantime please check out the Crop Walks posted to The Saskatchewan Ministry of Agriculture and Wheatland Conservation Area Facebook pages, as well as Twitter for the most recent updates.
data.text:

Events

Cropportunities 2024 will be held Thursday, March 14, 2024 @ Living Sky Casino Event Centre, Swift Current, SK.

Annual AgriARM Update (2024 Webinars)

https://register.gotowebinar.com/register/468816801821751389

https://register.gotowebinar.com/register/372974572251784032

For the full list of Saskatchewan Agriculture Crops Winter Webinars, visit https://www.saskatchewan.ca/business/agriculture-natural-resources-and-industry/agribusiness-farmers-and-ranchers/sask-ag-now/crops/crops-blog-posts/crops-winter-webinars

Annual Field Tour 2024 will be held from 9am-12pm on Thursday, July 18, 2024 in Swift Current.

2023 Annual AgriARM Update (Webinar recording) https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/5906305314040075095

Walk The Plots

Listen for “Walk The Plots” Radio Show with Glenda Lee Allan on CKSW (570) throughout the summer, every Tuesday on the noon hour, or find a recording on the Swift Current Online Podcast at a later date.
